title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as 

the Environment, Climate and 

Communications (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited environment climate communication (delegation ministerial functions) order 2023

title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications conferred on 
him – 

(a) 

by the Acts of the Oireachtas specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 

(b) by or under the provisions of the Acts of the Oireachtas specified 

in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

(c) 

under the Regulations specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, and 

(d) under the provisions of the Regulations specified in Part 4 of the 
Schedule, are delegated to Ossian Smyth, Minister of State at the 
Department of the Environment, Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [252] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister environment climate communication conferred - (a) act oireachtas specified part 1 schedule (b) provision act oireachtas specified part 2 schedule (c) regulation specified part 3 schedule (d) provision regulation specified part 4 schedule delegated ossian smyth minister state department environment climate communication notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 28th april 2023 252 3

title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: Waste Management Act 1996 (No. 10 of 1996)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Waste Management Act 1996 (No. 10 of 1996) 

Telecommunications (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1996 (No. 34 of 1996) 

Litter Pollution Act 1997 (No. 12 of 1997) 

Electronic Commerce Act 2000 (No. 27 of 2000) 

Communications Regulation Act 2002 (No. 20 of 2002) 

Digital Hub Development Agency Act 2003 (No. 23 of 2003) 

Telecommunications Services (Ducting and Cables) Act 2018 (No. 4 of 2018) 

Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 26 of 2022) 

Part 2 

Parts I, II, III, V and VII of the Postal and Telecommunications Services Act 
1983 (No. 24 of 1983) 

Section 14 of the Waste Management (Amendment) Act 2001 (No. 36 of 2001) 

Part 3 

Waste Management (Licensing) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 395 of 2004) 

European Communities (Waste Directive) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 126 of 
2011) 

European Communities (Electronic Communications Networks and Services) 
(Framework) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 333 of 2011) 

European Communities (Electronic Communications Networks and Services) 
(Universal Service and Users’ Rights) Regulations (S.I. No. 337 of 2011) 

European Union (Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment) Regulations 2014 
(S.I. No. 149 of 2014) 

European Union (End-of-Life Vehicles) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 281 of 2014) 

European Union (Packaging) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 282 of 2014) 

European Union (Batteries and Accumulators) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 283 
of 2014) 

European Union (Measures for a High Common Level of Security of Network 
and Information Systems) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 360 of 2018) 

European Union (Single Use Plastics) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 516 of 
2021) 

Separate Collection (Deposit Return Scheme) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 599 of 
2021) 

 
 
 
 
 4 [252] 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Tobacco Filters 
Containing Plastic) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 609 of 2022) 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Wet Wipes) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 610 of 2022) 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Balloons) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 611 of 2022) 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Fishing Gear Containing 
Plastic) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 612 of 2022) 

Regulations 4 to 9 of the European Union (Energy Efficiency) Regulations 2014 
(S.I. No. 426 of 2014) 

Part 4 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 April, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [252] 5 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
